title: Export Expert: Test Your Acrobat Exporting Skills

outline.text: 16. Yes or No: Can you export a PDF to XML format using Acrobat?
17. True or False: You can use the Snapshot tool to copy selected content as an image.
18. Scenario: You're a web developer who needs to export a PDF to HTML for your website.
Do you use the "Convert to HTML" option or manually code the content?
19. Yes or No: Can you select and copy text and images from a PDF using the Select tool?
20. True or False: The Autosave feature is disabled by default in Acrobat.
